    Creates a new shape with the given characteristics.

    Checks if the mouse currently is within the shape.

    • create

      public void create​(int x, int y, int w, int h, int stroke, int color)
      Description copied from class: Shape
      Creates a new shape with the given characteristics.
      Specified by:
      create in class Shape
      Parameters:
      x - The X-coordinate of the new shape to create
      y - The Y-coordinate of the new shape to create
      w - The width of the new shape to create
      h - The height of the new shape to create
      stroke - The stroke of the new shape to create (currently unused)
      color - The color of the new shape to create
